Class MembershipController

java.lang.Object
com.example.activityscheduler.membership.controller.MembershipController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/memberships") public class MembershipController extends Object
REST controller for managing Membership entities. Provides HTTP endpoints for membership operations including CRUD operations and status management.

    Request DTO for updating membership status.

      organizationRepository - the organization repository

  • Method Details

    • getAllMemberships

      @GetMapping public List<Membership> getAllMemberships()
      Retrieves all memberships.
      Returns:
      a list of all memberships

    • getMembership

      @GetMapping("/{orgId}/{userId}") public Optional<Membership> getMembership(@PathVariable String orgId, @PathVariable String userId)
      Retrieves a specific membership by organization ID and user ID.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the membership if found, empty otherwise

    • getMembershipsByOrganization

      @GetMapping("/organization/{orgId}") public List<Membership> getMembershipsByOrganization(@PathVariable String orgId)
      Retrieves all memberships for a specific organization.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      Returns:
      a list of memberships for the organization

    • getMembershipsByUser

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}") public List<Membership> getMembershipsByUser(@PathVariable String userId)
      Retrieves all memberships for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      a list of memberships for the user

    • getMembershipsByStatus

      @GetMapping("/status/{status}") public List<Membership> getMembershipsByStatus(@PathVariable MembershipStatus status)
      Retrieves all memberships with a specific status.
      Parameters:
      status - the membership status
      Returns:
      a list of memberships with the specified status

    • createMembership

      @PostMapping public Membership createMembership(@RequestBody MembershipController.MembershipRequest membershipRequest)
      Creates a new membership.
      Parameters:
      membershipRequest - the membership creation request
      Returns:
      the created membership

    • updateMembershipStatus

      @PutMapping("/{orgId}/{userId}/status") public Membership updateMembershipStatus(@PathVariable String orgId, @PathVariable String userId, @RequestBody MembershipController.StatusUpdateRequest statusUpdate)
      Updates the status of an existing membership.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      userId - the user ID
      statusUpdate - the status update request
      Returns:
      the updated membership

    • deleteMembership

      @DeleteMapping("/{orgId}/{userId}") public void deleteMembership(@PathVariable String orgId, @PathVariable String userId)
      Deletes a membership.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      userId - the user ID

    • existsMembership

      @GetMapping("/{orgId}/{userId}/exists") public boolean existsMembership(@PathVariable String orgId, @PathVariable String userId)
      Checks if a membership exists for the given organization and user.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      true if membership exists, false otherwise

    • countActiveMembers

      @GetMapping("/organization/{orgId}/active-count") public long countActiveMembers(@PathVariable String orgId)
      Counts the number of active members for an organization.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      Returns:
      the count of active members

    • countUserMemberships

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}/count") public long countUserMemberships(@PathVariable String userId)
      Counts the number of memberships for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      the count of memberships
